Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht suffered a jaw injury in the second half of the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers were extremely thin on the frontcourt with Rui Hachimura and Anthony Davis sidelined
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James waged a lone war for the team with 39 points on 62.5% shooting
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers dropped to 4-4 on the season, including 1-4 on their five-game road trip
Others: Dalton Knecht's first NBA start was against the Memphis Grizzlies
